creator: Lahore New Media Labs
descriptionHtml:
Dukan.pk is here to replace the old way of running grocery stores and retail shops manually using calculators.

This app is your one stop solution to add inventory, create customer bills, manage online orders, view profit & loss reports, manage all your customers’ credits and transactions directly through your smartphone. With its quick contact option you can connect with your customers seamlessly through SMS, Whats app or Phone Call.

Exclusive online e-commerce store with integrated payment options will be provided without any fee / charges.

Why choose Dukan.pk App?

it’s 100% FREE!
No hardware required to get started, It will work on your existing
Get Free weekly/monthly reports.
It’s fast, easy to use and reliable
Always get reliable results and calculations with every transaction
Got any trouble? No worries - our support team will help you!

Questions/Feedback?

descriptionShort: Pakistan's No.1 POS Mobile App
title: Dukan.pk - Sale, Purchase,  Khata Book & Much More

creator: Lahore New Media Labs
descriptionHtml:
Dukan.pk – brings a revolutionary and free platform that enables you to execute your busi ness activities effortlessly. The app will help you manage your business on the same scale as an expensive store management software system, currently being used by large departmental stores.

Moreover, this app is a solution to adding inventory (saman daraj karo), generating customer bills (customer ka bill banao), managing online orders, viewing profit & loss reports, managing customers’ credits (udhar) and transactions (khata book) directly through your smartphone. With its quick contact option, you can connect with your customers seamlessly through SMS, WhatsApp, or Phone Call.

Who Can Use This App?

• General Store
• Kiryana Store
• Grocery Store
• Pharmacy
• Online Business
• Garment Store
• Paan & Cigarette Shop
• Bakery Shop
• Cosmetic Shop
• Jewelry Shop
• Electronic Shop
• And Other Related Businesses

Features of App:

• Personalized E-Commerce Store for online selling
• Sell from your smartphone or tablet
• Fast Inventory Management
• Easy way to create Customer Bill
• Sales Report with Profit & Loss Details
• Track Sales Easily
• Manage Customers and their order history
• Send Digital Receipts/Invoices to customers
• WhatsApp Integration
• Barcode Scanner
• Multilingual in English, Urdu, and Roman Urdu
• And most importantly different payment gateways to execute digital payments.

Why Choose Dukan.pk App?

• 100% FREE!
• No hardware required to get started
• Free store website instantly
• Organize stock/items with sale/purchase price and multiple units support easily
• Get free weekly/monthly reports.
• Fast, easy to use, secure and reliable
• Always get reliable results and calculations with every transaction

How to Download and Use?

1. Download “Dukan.pk” from google play store
2. Create a shop by following the easy process
3. Add inventory (saman darj karo) through bar code scan with pricing
4. Generate bill for customers easily
5. Add customers in Khata Register for transactions (udhar khata)
6. Get notifications of sales reports and status of current inventory
7. Dukan.pk will look after your business.

Other names for Dukan app are:

Khataapp, debit credit ledger, hisab kitab daily, udhaar app, udhaar khata, ledger book, credit ledger, khatabook, khatabook app, digital udhar khata, digital khata, udhar ledger, khatabook, udhaar, store hisab kitab, hisaab app, Inventory management, Khata register, view orders, sales report

Questions/Feedback:

If you are facing any difficulty, please call us at +92-332-1422241 for support. You can also contact us via email info@dukan.pk

descriptionShort: Dukan.pk – Create Your Web Store In Minutes
title: Dukan.pk - Free Website, Payments, Sale Report

creator: Lahore New Media Labs
descriptionHtml:
Dukan.pk is a revolutionary point of sales system that enables you to create
your own customized web store in minutes. This user friendly app supports online
selling, delivery, pickup and counter sales to help you manage your entire business
through your smartphone.
Moreover, this app is a solution to managing online orders through a web-
store, adding inventory, processing orders, generating customer’s bills, viewing
profit & loss reports, managing customers’ credits and transactions directly
through your smartphone. With its quick contact option, you can connect with your
customers swiftly through SMS, WhatsApp, or Phone Call.

Features of App:
● Personalized E-Commerce Store for online selling
● Sell from your smartphone or tablet
● Fast inventory management
● Easy way to create Customer Bill
● Multilingual in English, Urdu, and Roman Urdu
● Reliable payment gateways to execute digital payments. 
● Sales report with profit & loss details
● Track sales easily
● Manage customers and their order history
● Send digital receipts/invoices to customers
● WhatsApp integration
● Barcode scanner

Who Can Use This App?
● Online Businesses
● Home Sellers
● General Stores
● Pharmacies
● Kiryana Stores
● Grocery Stores
● Garments Stores
● Bakery and Restaurants
● Cosmetics Shops
● Jewelry Shops
● Electronics Shops
● Automotive Shops
● Other Related Businesses

Why Choose Dukan.pk App?
● No hardware required to get started
● Free web store created instantly
● Organize stock/items with sale/purchase price and multiple units support
easily
● Get free weekly/monthly reports
● Fast, easy to use, secure and reliable
● Transparent transactions through reliable payment gateways
How to Download and Use?
1. Download “Dukan.pk” from your App Store
2. Create a web store by following the easy process
3. Customize your web store with your personalized theme, logo and cover
image
4. Add inventory with product image, description and pricing
5. View pending order details and update order status easily
6. Generate E-bill for customers to be shared online
7. Choose a delivery partner if required
8. Get notifications of sales reports and status of current inventory

9. Add customers in Khata Register for transaction
10. Dukan.pk will look after your business.

management, khata register, view orders, sales report

descriptionShort: Create Your Web Store In 29 Seconds
title: Dukan.pk – Digitizing Sellers

creator: Lahore New Media Labs
descriptionHtml:
Dukan.pk is a dynamic shift in how businesses are run in Pakistan. With any kind of business involving products to be sold, be it a grocery store, a pharmacy, an eatery or a home-based business setup, you can create your customized web-store with Dukan.pk in not more than 29 seconds.
This super-efficient user friendly app supports online selling, delivery, pickup, counter and credit sales (Khaata) to help you manage your entire business through your smartphone.
Moreover, this app is a solution to manage online orders through a web-store, add inventory with complete details of the products, process orders, generate customer’s bills, apply tax on your store as well as on each product separately, view profit & loss reports, and to manage sales on credit directly through your smartphone. With its quick contact option, you can connect with your customers swiftly through SMS, WhatsApp, or Phone Call.

Features of App:
• Personalized E-Commerce Store for online selling
• Sell from your smartphone or tablet
• Complete inventory management
• Easy way to create Customer Bill
• Multilingual in English, Urdu, and Roman Urdu
• Reliable payment gateways to execute digital payments
• Apply tax on your store and each product separately
• Sales report with profit & loss details
• Track sales with complete transparency
• Manage counter as well as credit (Khaata) sales ledger
• Manage customers and their order history
• Send digital receipts/invoices to customers
• WhatsApp integration
• Barcode scanner

Who Can Use This App?
• Online Businesses
• Home Sellers
• General Stores
• Pharmacies
• Kiryana Stores
• Grocery Stores
• Garments Stores
• Bakery and Restaurants
• Cosmetics Shops
• Jewelry Shops
• Electronics Shops
• Automotive Shops
• Other Related Businesses

Why Choose Dukan.pk App?
• No hardware required to get started
• Free web-store created instantly
• Organize stock/items with sale/purchase price and multiple units support
easily

• Fast, easy to use, secure and reliable
• Transparent transactions through reliable payment gateways

How to Download and Use?

descriptionShort: Create Your Web Store In 29 Seconds
title: Dukan.pk – Digitizing Sellers

creator: Lahore New Media Labs
descriptionHtml:
Dukan is a complete e-commerce solution for you to take your business online. Dukan App allows you to create your store in just 29 seconds and access a host of services that are critical for a successful e-commerce business. From product and inventory management, khata - bookkeeping, accepting online payments through EasyPaisa, JazzCash OR credit cards, multiple delivery options with Bykea or Pandago for quick 30 mins delivery to Trax and Movex for nationwide fulfillment.

Some of the key Dukan app features are as follows:

FREE online store for your business
- Give a few basic details and create your online store
- Customize your web store as per the needs of your brand
- Create vouchers and discounts for your customers

Manage inventory in the app
- Upload products with pictures, descriptions, quantity and variants, etc.
- Set prices tax application for different products
- Apply tax on all or different products separately

Process orders easily
- Manage all orders in easy to use dashboard
- Generate and print bills
- See your customers and conversion details

Enable payments gateways
- Secure online payments
- COD or online payment gateways; choose as per your convenience
- Let your customers buy in installments with Qisstpay

Deliver your orders swiftly
- Get a delivery partner with just one tap on your phone
- Choose from a range of delivery partners integrated into the app
- Real-time order tracking on your phone

Design and run marketing campaigns
- Choose from the in-app customizable designs to create:
- Facebook and Instagram ads
- Business cards
- WhatsApp status
- Put funds in the Dukan wallet and run focused ad campaigns on
- Facebook
- Instagram

Sales report & khata management
- Get a detailed sales report maintained in the app
- Record your receivables/payables and get a khata maintained in the app

Serving retailers & wholesalers alike
- Upload inventory in the app and let your retailers book orders online
- Retailers can book orders in the app and receive delivery from the wholesalers

Who can use this app?
Whether you own a Kiryana /Grocery /Garments /Bakery /Restaurant /Cosmetics /Jewelry /Electronics /Automotive /General store, or you are a home seller who wants to run an ecommerce business, Dukan app is for you to easily start selling online.

From product and inventory management, khata - bookkeeping, accepting online payments through EasyPaisa, JazzCash OR credit cards, multiple delivery options with Bykea or Pandago for quick 30 mins delivery to Trax and Movex for nationwide fulfillment.

Some of the key Dukan app features are as follows:

FREE online store for your business
- Give a few basic details and create your online store
- Customize your web store as per the needs of your brand
- Create vouchers and discounts for your customers

Manage inventory in the app
- Upload products with pictures, descriptions, quantity and variants, etc.
- Set prices tax application for different products
- Apply tax on all or different products separately

Process orders easily
- Manage all orders in easy to use dashboard
- Generate and print bills
- See your customers and conversion details

Enable payments gateways
- Secure online payments
- COD or online payment gateways; choose as per your convenience
- Let your customers buy in installments with Qisstpay

Deliver your orders swiftly
- Get a delivery partner with just one tap on your phone
- Choose from a range of delivery partners integrated into the app
- Real-time order tracking on your phone

Design and run marketing campaigns
- Choose from the in-app customizable designs to create:
- Facebook and Instagram ads
- Business cards
- WhatsApp status
- Put funds in the Dukan wallet and run focused ad campaigns on
- Facebook
- Instagram

Sales report & khata management
- Get a detailed sales report maintained in the app
- Record your receivables/payables and get a khata maintained in the app

Serving retailers & wholesalers alike
- Upload inventory in the app and let your retailers book orders online
- Retailers can book orders in the app and receive delivery from the wholesalers

Who can use this app?
Whether you own a Kiryana /Grocery /Garments /Bakery /Restaurant /Cosmetics /Jewelry /Electronics /Automotive /General store, or you are a home seller who wants to run an ecommerce business, Dukan app is for you to easily start selling online.
